person.persName: Pleasant J. Potter (Warren County, Kentucky, sheriff.)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Julia F. Hill Potter in Warren County, Kentucky, on January 22, 1844. Father of Elizabeth B. Potter, Mary R Potter, James E. Potter, Lavenia Potter, Ella Potter, Effie C. Potter, Sallie A. Potter, Pleasant Potter, Emma Potter, Willie Potter, and Pearl Potter. Farmer in Warren County in 1850. Farmer in Warren County in 1860. Sheriff of Warren County in 1861.
